name: Wirewing Racer 99
description:
Take on 98 ai opponents in this racing game where every bit of boost matters! Can you be the first across the finish line? It'll take precise maneuvering, split second reflexes, and a whole lot of speed!

Download recommended for best experience.

For instructions, please select "How to Play" from the in-game menu. 

If you've got any feedback, be sure to leave it in the comments. Thanks for playing!
